testcase.classname: verify the OMRBranchAdactinAutomation Loginpage to Search hotel page details
testcase.name: Verifying Adactin Login page by selecting all fields
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin Page...............................................passed When User should Login "najimunisab","Naji@123".............................passed Then User should verify after Login success message "Hello Najimunisab!"....passed When User should Search hotel "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Standard","3 - Three","12/08/2022","13/08/2022","2 - Two" and "2 - Two".passed Then User should verify after search "Select Hotel".........................passed

testcase.classname: verify the OMRBranchAdactinAutomation Loginpage to Search hotel page details
testcase.name: Verifying Adactin Login page by entering only mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin Page...............................................passed When User should Login "najimunisab","Naji@123".............................passed Then User should verify after Login success message "Hello Najimunisab!"....passed When User should Search hotel only mandatory fields "Melbourne","3 - Three","12/08/2022","13/08/2022" and "2 - Two".passed Then User should verify after search "Select Hotel".........................passed

testcase.classname: verify the OMRBranchAdactinAutomation Loginpage to Search hotel page details
testcase.name: Verifying Adactin Login page by selecting invalide date
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin Page...............................................passed When User should Login "najimunisab","Naji@123".............................passed Then User should verify after Login success message "Hello Najimunisab!"....passed When User should Search hotel by selecting invalid date "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Standard","3 - Three","13/08/2023","10/08/2022","2 - Two" and "2 - Two".passed Then User should verify after search exact two error message in Date Checking "Check-In Date shall be before than Check-Out Date","Check-Out Date shall be after than Check-In Date".passed

testcase.classname: verify the OMRBranchAdactinAutomation Loginpage to Search hotel page details
testcase.name: Verifying Adactin Login page by without entering any fields
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin Page...............................................passed When User should Login "najimunisab","Naji@123".............................passed Then User should verify after Login success message "Hello Najimunisab!"....passed When User should Search hotel without selecting any fields..................passed Then User should verify after search exact error message "Please Select a Location".passed
